docs.lead_paragraph: New high records in heavy and medium sized air-conditioning equipment sales are being set in both domestic and foreign sales by leading American producers, a canvassh)0*0*0*iof manufacturers disclosed here yesterday. Large buildings in Asia and South America have been scheduled for complete air-conditioning installations, and many department stores in the United States are also being fully equipped.

docs.snippet: The foreign exchange market idled through a week of light turnover, yet it was interesting because of the sharp upward trend in the free units of Canada and Switzerland, and the Portuguese escudo. It also marked the first setback in sterling...
docs.lead_paragraph: The foreign exchange market idled through a week of light turnover, yet it was interesting because of the sharp upward trend in the free units of Canada and Switzerland, and the Portuguese escudo. It also marked the first setback in sterling "forwards" in the last five weeks, but this was of modest proportions and applied chiefly to contracts ranging 90 days and beyond.
